name: @revenium/openai
description: Transparent TypeScript middleware for automatic Revenium usage tracking with OpenAI

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true})"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.example:openai-basic: npm run build && npx ts-node examples/openai-basic.ts
scripts.example:openai-streaming: npm run build && npx ts-node examples/openai-streaming.ts
scripts.example:azure-basic: npm run build && npx ts-node examples/azure-basic.ts
scripts.example:azure-streaming: npm run build && npx ts-node examples/azure-streaming.ts
scripts.example:openai-responses-basic: npm run build && npx ts-node examples/openai-responses-basic.ts
scripts.example:openai-responses-streaming: npm run build && npx ts-node examples/openai-responses-streaming.ts
scripts.example:azure-responses-basic: npm run build && npx ts-node examples/azure-responses-basic.ts
scripts.example:azure-responses-streaming: npm run build && npx ts-node examples/azure-responses-streaming.ts

author: Revenium
